message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.GT 

This paper deals with a problem in multi-armed bandit (MAB) with combinatorial actions, which is a popular topic in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The paper also introduces a new condition called the triggering probability modulated (TPM) bounded smoothness condition, which is a novel contribution to the field. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), and cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
